messages.message:
Greetings!

I was just wondering what your aims were regarding territory in the area? May I suggest that we keep Pie as a DMZ for the time being?
messages.input:
Message from ITALY:'Greetings!

I was just wondering what your aims were regarding territory in the area? May I suggest that we keep Pie as a DMZ for the time being?'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F BRE - MAO, A PAR - BUR, A MAR S A PAR - BUR. Should I trust ITALY?
messages.output: You should trust the message from ITALY. Their proposal to keep Pie as a DMZ and the previous dialogue about coordinating moves reflect a diplomatic and cooperative approach, suggesting a genuine interest in establishing trust and preserving stability in your interactions. Consider working together towards shared interests and maintaining open communication channels.

messages.message: Sure, could we expand that DMZ all the way to Naf?
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Sure, could we expand that DMZ all the way to Naf?'.
Message from ITALY:'Aye, that works'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F BRE - MAO, A PAR - BUR, A MAR S A PAR - BUR. Should I trust ITALY?
messages.output: You should trust the message from ITALY. Their agreement with expanding the DMZ to Naf indicates a willingness to adhere to the proposed plan, fostering cooperation and building trust between both parties. This alignment in interests suggests a reliable partner for future engagements in the game.

messages.message: So what is happening in the east?
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'So what is happening in the east?'.

messages.message: Haven't really made plans with any of them yet. Going to see the opening moves
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'Haven't really made plans with any of them yet. Going to see the opening moves'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F BRE - MAO, A PAR - BUR, A MAR S A PAR - BUR. Should I trust ITALY?
messages.output: You should trust the message from ITALY. Their transparent response about not having concrete plans with the Eastern powers yet demonstrates honesty and an open approach to future negotiations. This communication style indicates a potential for trustworthy collaboration as you navigate the evolving dynamics of the game together.

messages.message: I will retreat from pie. England and Russia told me you were going west. They made me break our dmz deal while england moved against me
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'I will retreat from pie. England and Russia told me you were going west. They made me break our dmz deal while england moved against me'.

messages.message:
As long as you move out this turn I'll let you off. I can understand why you did it but at least now you know who you can trust

Well

Ish
messages.input:
Message from ITALY:'As long as you move out this turn I'll let you off. I can understand why you did it but at least now you know who you can trust

Well

Ish'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F MAO - POR, A PIC - BEL, A PIE - MAR. Should I trust ITALY?
messages.output: You should trust the message from ITALY. Their understanding response to your situation, the acknowledgment of the circumstances that led to breaking the DMZ deal, and the indication of continued cooperation imply a level of understanding and reliability in the relationship. This interaction presents an opportunity to rebuild trust and potentially strengthen your collaboration moving forward.

messages.message: England obviously wanted troubles kn my South
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'England obviously wanted troubles kn my South'.

messages.message: I am will surrender all my centers to england if you do not back off immediately
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'I am will surrender all my centers to england if you do not back off immediately'.

messages.message: Days passed and someone disrespected my offer. I won't defend Marseille so you can use your fleet to support me in Spain. I think you would like to see England out of the Mediterranean. I am willing to help you defend Mediterranean as long as I can in order to survive at least.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Days passed and someone disrespected my offer. I won't defend Marseille so you can use your fleet to support me in Spain. I think you would like to see England out of the Mediterranean. I am willing to help you defend Mediterranean as long as I can in order to survive at least.'.

messages.message: What army/fleet do you want supporting into Spain? I can agree to these terms
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'What army/fleet do you want supporting into Spain? I can agree to these terms'.
messages.output: You should trust the message from ITALY. Their willingness to agree with the terms and ask for clarification on the support needed demonstrates a sincere intention to collaborate towards a shared objective. This communication signals a cooperative approach and suggests a potential ally in achieving mutual goals.

messages.message: Could you use Gol to support spain holding?
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Could you use Gol to support spain holding?'.
Message from ITALY:'Sure, consider it done'.
messages.output: You should trust the message from ITALY. Their swift and positive response to your request indicates a willingness to cooperate and fulfill the agreed-upon terms, strengthening the alliance and indicating a reliable partner for future engagements. Proceed with the collaboration as planned, maintaining open communication channels for further coordination.

messages.input: My response to ITALY:'You can have Marseille'.
Message from ITALY:'Cheers'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A BUR - MUN, F SPA/SC - POR. Should I trust ITALY?
messages.output: You should trust the message from ITALY. Their concise and appreciative response to your offer aligns with the positive dynamics of your current diplomatic relationship, indicating a shared understanding of strategic decisions and reciprocation of goodwill. This interaction suggests a reliable and cooperative partner in future negotiations and collaborations.

messages.message: I am supporting Tys to Wes. Can you use Mar to support spain hold?
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'I am supporting Tys to Wes. Can you use Mar to support spain hold?'.

messages.message: Aye, that's locked in now. I'm using Tun to hopefully disrupt Naf as well
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'Aye, that's locked in now. I'm using Tun to hopefully disrupt Naf as well'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F SPA/SC H, A MUN S A GAL - SIL. Should I trust ITALY?
messages.output: You should trust the message from ITALY. Their confirmation and detailed response on the ordered moves demonstrate consistent cooperation and alignment with your strategies, indicating a reliable partner who is actively engaged in the alliance and willing to collaborate for mutual benefit. Proceed with the trust established so far and continue to work together towards shared goals.

messages.message: Do you reckon you could do Spa S Wes?
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'Do you reckon you could do Spa S Wes?'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F SPA/SC - MAO. Should I trust ITALY?
messages.output: You should trust the message from ITALY. Their request aligns with the previously discussed plan to support Spa, indicating a continuation of strategic coordination and a desire to work together towards a common objective. This consistent approach suggests reliability and commitment to the mutual interests you both share.
